XIII.i.6.2.c
.
Amount of MOHP for a Surviving Spouse
The monthly rate of MOHP is specified in
38 U.S.C. 1562
and is the same rate for a Medal of Honor recipient or a surviving spouse.
Important
:  A surviving spouse shall not receive more than one MOHP, regardless of whether they were married to more than one person who was awarded a Medal of Honor.
Reference
:  For more information on payment rates for MOHP for a surviving spouse, see the
rate table
.
